Text: Could I make a request? If you ever could put up Because of the times by KOL,or any of the earlier albums to that would be amazing. Not a huge fan of them anymore but love that album.  I own the vinyl just dont have the capabilities to rip it. Keep up the awesome work!!! Thanks!
